question:
Consider the following statements about the National Programme for Organic Production (NPOP):
  1. The programme has been formulated under the Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
  2. It aims to boost organic food export in International market
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
First statement is incorrect. The National Programme for Organic Production is run by the Agricultural & Processed Foods Export Development Authority (APEDA) of the Ministry of Commerce. Second statement is correct. The programme aims to certify the organic products produced in the country. The programme aims to:
  • provide the means of evaluation of certification programme for organic agriculture and products
  • accredit certification programmes of Certification Bodies seeking accreditation
  • facilitate certification of organic products in conformity with the prescribed standards
  • facilitate certification of organic products in conformity with the importing countries organic standards as per equivalence agreement between the two countries or as per importing country requirements
  • encourage the development of organic farming and organic processing
